experience.title: Software Development Engineer — Android & React Native
responsibilities: Lead frontend engineer for Airtel Money modules using widget-driven low-code architecture across React Native and native Android.
Built a high-throughput QR scanning pipeline using Google ML Kit and CameraX handling ~2.4M daily UPI transactions (~60% volume) with >80% success rate.
Implemented UPI features (UPI Lite, AutoPay, Mandates, Credit-on-UPI) and ensured NPCI/RBI compliance and robust security.
Optimized app performance: reduced APK size, improved cold-start times, and maintained 99.98% crash-free sessions.
Introduced GrowthBook for feature experimentation and built frontend SIT environments—improving velocity across 4+ pods.
Enabled Google Integrity API in Android to secure Airtel Thanks App and supported NPCI compliance for UPI Adhaar OTP, UPI Mapper, and UPI on Credit Card.

experience.title: Specialist Programmer — Data Engineer
responsibilities: Built scalable ETL/data pipelines for L’Oréal (EMEA) using PySpark, DBT, Airflow, and GCP.
Authored 2000+ lines of DBT SQL for KPI dashboards and automated data cleaning, saving ~70% manual effort.
Integrated analytics with Firebase & Apache Superset for real-time product reporting.
